item.title: Introduction
Reaching Consensus Open Blockchains
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Reaching consensus on open blockchains Moderator- Pindar Wong Gavin Andresen, MIT Digital Currency Initiative Vitalik Buterin, Ethereum Foundation Eric Lombrozo, Ciphrex and Bitcoin Core Neha Narula, MIT Media Lab Digital Currency Initiative Please silence your cell phone during this session. Thank you. Please silence your cell phones during this session. Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, please take your seats. The session is about to begin.
